div.p:
We’re more than developers
We’re global problem solvers.Create smart solutions that power businesses worldwide

Established in 2015, Softhealer Technologies has grown into a trusted name in the IT industry with 9+ years of excellence in delivering cutting-edge technology solutions. We specialize in ERP software, website development, and mobile applications. Our mission is to provide innovative, efficient, and scalable solutions that empower businesses worldwide.

div.span: with a diverse clientele from different industries.
dedicated to delivering the best solutions.
from development to deployment and beyond.
staying ahead of industry trends and technologies.

div.p: At Softhealer, we foster a culture where creativity, collaboration, and growth thrive. Here’s what drives us
We stay ahead of the curve by embracing the latest technologies and methodologies to deliver outstanding results.
We believe in the power of teamwork. Each person’s contribution is vital, and we encourage an open exchange of ideas.

div.class: col-xxl-6 xxl-6 col-xl-6 col-lg-6 col-md-6 col-sm-12 align-self-center

div.p: We value transparency, honesty, and trust in every interaction, both within the team and with our clients.
Whether personal or professional, we’re committed to your development. We provide ample learning opportunities and career growth paths.

div.h4:
Create new job pages from the
+New
top-right button.

div.class: col-xxl-4 col-xl-4 col-lg-6 col-md-6 col-sm-6 sh_main_box

div.h1: Real Stories, Real Impact: Employee Insights

div.span: success is more than a result; it’s a shared journey of growth, collaboration, and innovation that empowers everyone to shine. After completing 5 years i can honestly say Softhealer has always been more than just a workplace. In a world full of opportunities - It’s a place where ideas flow freely, where challenges are met with collective effort, and where every success feels like a shared victory. I feel more inspired than ever to continue contributing, learning, and pushing boundaries alongside such a talented and supportive team. At Softhealer , we’re more than a team—we’re a family, always supporting, lifting, and growing together!

Softhealer has provided me with a platform to learn, evolve, and constantly evaluate my progress. The opportunities presented are great for me in the longer scheme of my career growth too. They not only enabled me to implement new ideas but also gave me the platform to learn from my mistakes. In the past 6+ years, continuous feedback and conversation with my manager have groomed my designing, leadership etc skills and have helped me build a vision of what I would like to achieve in the coming few years.

I have had an incredible 5 years with Softhealer, where I faced many challenging tasks that helped me learn and grow. The company’s supportive culture, led by a highly motivating owner, provided trust and opportunities to tackle projects that enhanced my skills. It’s been a truly enriching and rewarding journey.

Being part of Softhealer Technologies Pvt. Ltd. for the past 4 years has been a truly enriching and transformative experience. The vibrant work culture, focus on collaboration, and supportive environment have provided me with countless opportunities to innovate, learn, and grow as an Odoo ERP Developer. It's more than just a workplace—it's a hub of inspiration where teamwork and excellence drive success every day.

I work with a group of people who are truly passionate about their work. I feel supported in this environment, which encourages me to take on new and challenging tasks. This company has become a career changer for me, and I genuinely enjoy my work. Behind the success of every company is the hard work of its employees, and above all, there is a visionary leader. For us, that leader is Riken Pethad, whose efforts to achieve the company's vision truly inspire me.

Working at Softhealer in the POS department has been a truly rewarding experience. The team is incredibly supportive, always ready to lend a helping hand whenever needed. The work environment is positive, inclusive, and welcoming, which makes coming to work each day enjoyable. There's a strong emphasis on collaboration, ensuring that everyone works together toward common goals. It’s a place where personal and professional growth is encouraged, allowing individuals to thrive and succeed as part of a united team.

Spending over 5 years at Softhealer Technologies has been an incredibly rewarding journey, both as a graphic designer and in HR. As a designer, it’s been a creative and fulfilling experience, from developing innovative solutions to collaborating with a talented team. Meanwhile, in HR, I’ve had the privilege of contributing to the growth of an organization that values talent and development. This journey has not only helped me grow professionally but has also allowed me to play a part in building an environment where everyone thrives and creates impactful work.

After I graduated from college, I joined Softhealer and have spent four wonderful years here. The supportive culture and teamwork helped me grow my skills and creativity. I’m proud to work at a place that values each person, celebrates ideas, and turns challenges into opportunities.

I have been working for almost six years, and my journey so far has been amazing—rising from the bottom to the top. One thing that has always motivated me is the unwavering support from the organization, which means a lot to me. It truly feels like I have been a part of the company’s family from the very beginning. The company has provided immense support, both professionally and personally.

What sets softhealer apart is its commitment to its employees' well-being. The balance between work and life is respected, and the support provided during challenges—both professional and personal—has made this organization feel like a second family.

div.p: We are a team of passionate people whose goal is to improve everyone's life through disruptive products. We build great products to solve your business problems.

div.h3: Join us and help disrupt the enterprise market!
div.p: Join us, we offer you an extraordinary chance to learn, to develop and to be part of an exciting experience and team.
